dataIdInfo.idAbs: Use this tool to generate the 3D Urban Information Model (3DUIM) database schema or parts of it.

tool.name: SchemaGenerator

param.name: in_gdb
param.dialogReference: The File Geodatabase in which all the Domains, Feature, Object and Relationship classes are to be generated.

param.name: spatial_reference
param.dialogReference: The spatial reference system to use for all feature classes.

param.name: generate_classes
param.expression: {AnnotatedSpace | Building | BuildingEntrancePoint | BuildingShell | BuildingShellPart | BuildingInteriorSpace | BuildingFloor | BuildingInteriorStructure | InteriorInstallation | StreetFurniture | Sensor | SensorCoverage | Sign | Tree | ZoningDistrict | Parcel | LandCover}

param.name: generate_relationships
param.expression: {BuildingHasEntrance | BuildingHasShell | BuildingHasShellPart | BuildingHasSpace | BuildingHasFloor | FloorHasSpace | FloorHasStructure | SensorHasCoverage | SpaceHasInstallation | ZoneHasRegulation | ParcelHasRegulation | ParcelHasNeigborhood}

param.name: configuration_files_location
param.dialogReference: The folder containing the schema configuration files. These are part of the 3DUIM release package and can be found under /Application/Configuration/.

tool.summary: Use this tool to generate the 3D Urban Information Model (3DUIM) database schema or parts of it.
tool.usage: Create an empty File Geodatabase, run this tool, select the new File Geodatabase and fill in the parameters.
